Text: I hope youre coping okHey Chris I hope the madness thats been occurring over there isnt weighing you down too much I just wanted you to know my offer stands if youd be interested in looking at moving to LA to manage our TE Our asset base has been growing and we are looking to expand some more Your expertise would be tremendous Let me know Mark L Gazzilli Cook Inlet Energy Supply DirectorEastGulf Coast Trading and Marketing

How are you doingHey Chris Ive been meaning to call you to see how everything is going Give me a shout when you get back in the office Mark L Gazzilli Cook Inlet Energy Supply DirectorEastGulf Coast Trading and Marketing

RE I hope youre coping okLet me know what she says You better believe Dynegy is better than bankruptcy Hang in there Mark L Gazzilli Cook Inlet Energy Supply DirectorEastGulf Coast Trading and Marketing Original Message From mailto Sent Friday November AM To Subject RE I hope youre coping ok Thanks I appreciate that It is a bit gloomy and MOODY over here I dont think too many people are excited about Dynegy but its better than bankruptcy And I do appreciate the job offer its just hard to do with a family But I will chat with my significant other and see what she says Ive asked her about moving before and I thought she was going to hit me Original Message From Mark Gazzilli ENRON Sent Thursday November PM To Chris Germany Email Subject I hope youre coping ok Hey Chris I hope the madness thats been occurring over there isnt weighing you down too much I just wanted you to know my offer stands if youd be interested in looking at moving to LA to manage our TE Our asset base has been growing and we are looking to expand some more Your expertise would be tremendous Let me know Mark L Gazzilli Cook Inlet Energy Supply DirectorEastGulf Coast Trading and Marketing This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
